text: Patrick J. "Pat" Smullen (22 May 1977 â€“ 15 September 2020) was an Irish jockey. He won the Irish flat racing Champion Jockey title nine times. Smullen was born in County Offaly, Ireland. Smullen died on 15 September 2020 from pancreatic cancer at the age of 43. ==References== ==Other websites== * NTRA profile * Racing Post Profile Category:1977 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
